user_query: I want to analyze whale transactions on the Ethereum, Tron, and Binance Chain blockchains.

TaskList.description: Fetch the latest whale transactions from the Ethereum blockchain and obtain details such as transaction amount, sender, and receiver.
Fetch the latest whale transactions from the Tron blockchain and obtain details such as transaction amount, sender, and receiver.
Fetch the latest whale transactions from the Binance Chain blockchain and obtain details such as transaction amount, sender, and receiver.
Aggregate the results from the previous three subtasks to calculate the total number of transactions.
Measure the execution time of the API calls made in subtasks 1, 2, and 3.
